name: Xavier Lionfang's Armor
description: Xavier Lionfang, the younger brother of Maximilian Lionfang, once was a great leader in King Alteon's army. After his father's dream, Xavier left the military to seek revenge. Starting to believe in his brother's beliefs on the truce and plans to usurp King Alteon, Xavier devised a failed plot to poison King Alteon. Only the thought of revenge keeps Xavier up at night.
